{{Quote|Myk, to the kitchens.|[[Lord Commander of the Night's Watch|Lord Commander]] [[Jeor Mormont]]|You Win or You Die}}
'''Myk''' is an unidentified background character in the [[Season 1|first season]]. He is a newly made [[Steward (Night's Watch)|Steward]] of the [[Night's Watch]], of the same group of recruits as [[Jon Snow]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no member of the Night's Watch called Myk.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
Myk is present during the speech [[Lord Commander of the Night's Watch|Lord Commander]] [[Jeor Mormont]] gives to the "graduating" recruits. Myk is assigned to the kitchens.<ref>"[[You Win or You Die]]"</ref>
